main event: A witness observed an oval-shaped, silvery object approximately 30 feet in diameter moving at a high rate of speed over Hamilton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 10-15 seconds before it disappeared., The witness is an employee of the Environmental Control Division at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base., The witness has observed several similar objects in the past., The sighting occurred on July 13, 1961., The object was considered to be of scientific interest by the observer.
witness description: an employee of the Environmental Control Division at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base
